title: Intravenous anaesthesia. Part 2
creator_credit: Realist Films, ICI (GB) and Yvonne Fletcher
brief_description: As in Part 1, pentothal is chosen as the anaesthetic to be demonstrated. More advanced techniques are shown than those in Part 1, and, in particular, the use of pentothal as an adjuvant to nitrous oxide.
description: As in Part 1, pentothal is chosen as the anaesthetic to be demonstrated. More advanced techniques are shown than those in Part 1, and, in particular, the use of pentothal as an adjuvant to nitrous oxide.
